mapper.select: select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_contents as noticeContents, notice_write_date as noticeWriteDate, notice_view_count as noticeViewCount from (select notice.*, row_number() over(order by NOTICE_NO desc) as num from notice) where num between #{startTotalBoard} and #{endTotalBoard}
select count(*) as TotalCount from notice
